name: NSFont.TextStyle
desc: Constants that specify the preferred text styles you use with fonts.

items.name: static let body: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for body text.

items.name: static let callout: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for callouts.

items.name: static let caption1: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for standard captions.

items.name: static let caption2: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for alternate captions.

items.name: static let footnote: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use in footnotes.

items.name: static let headline: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for headings.

items.name: static let subheadline: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for subheadings.

items.name: static let largeTitle: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for large titles.

items.name: static let title1: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for first-level hierarchical headings.

items.name: static let title2: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for second-level hierarchical headings.

items.name: static let title3: NSFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font you use for third-level hierarchical headings.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
